main.title: Media monitoring
main.subtitle: Social media monitoring with visual insights!
main.clientsTitle: More than 100+ clients all over Kazakhstan
main.functionTitle: Unique features to increase your productivity

card1.title: Secure platform
card1.text: The system provides reliable data storage, encryption and confidentiality of your personal and business information.

card2.title: Advanced analytics
card2.text: Analysis of metadata using artificial intelligence.

card3.title: Powerful automation
card3.text: Algorithms categorize messages, identify trends, search for mentions in texts on images, and determine the tonality.

card1.title: Exceptional and easy to use
card1.text: The Scano system is a place where social media analytics are conducted, allowing you to save your time and develop your brand in an even more effective way.
card1.subtitle: Economically effective
card1.subtext: Use customer feedback to make informed business decisions.

card2.title: An innovative system
card2.text: Thanks to modern technologies, we have accelerated the process of collecting information
card2.subtitle: Be the first to find out about the most important thing

card3.title: Full control of the information field
card3.text: Determine the scope and importance of the mentions. Filter out the noise and focus on what's important
card3.subtitle: Track the indicators
card3.subtext: Study ready-made overview charts and analytical reports

howIt.howItTitle: Work smarter with easy user access.

card1.title: 01. Create an account
card1.subtitle: Create an account
card1.text: Find out what people like or dislike about your company. Share information with your entire organization.

card2.title: 02. Confirm
card2.subtitle: Confirm your email
card2.text: Follow the link and come up with a strong password.

card3.title: 03. Start
card3.subtitle: Start working
card3.text: Log in and keep up to date with current events.

footer.subtitle: Convenience
footer.headTitle: Collecting publications by keywords in different languages in real time
footer.title: Suitable for all devices and screens
footer.text: It is possible to use both the mobile version and the full version of the site.

about.title: About our company
about.subtitle: Our goal is to enhance the image of your organization using advanced technologies with convenient and simple functionality

whatWeDo.title: What we do
whatWeDo.text: We provide an overview of the discussions in the Internet space. We identify potential crises. And warn you about the negative reactions of society.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.text: Help brands analyze social media reviews and interact with customers based on advanced analytics.

quality.subtitle: Qualities
quality.title: History and principles at the core of our company

card1.title: Awareness
card1.text: We always strive to stay informed about global updates.

card2.title: What we do
card2.text: We create emotional connections, solve problems, and inspire our clients to achieve outstanding results.

card3.title: Teamwork
card3.text: We have a cohesive and qualified development team and their leader.

card4.title: Responsibility
card4.text: We are committed to providing the highest quality products and services that meet your needs and expectations.

banner.title: Can't find a suitable position?
banner.text: Don't worry, in any case, contact us, we are always ready to offer you an excellent job!

peculiarities.title: Features
peculiarities.subtitle: Create reports and analytics that match your needs. We provide extensive options for data customization and visualization.

card1.title: Kazakh language
card1.text: Users of the system will be able to determine the tonality of texts and images or video materials in the Kazakh language with an accuracy of up to 90% within a short time

card2.title: User-friendly interface
card2.text: A user interface suitable for every person

card3.title: Source coverage
card3.text: Coverage of the largest number of sources, even the most obscure Kazakh media

analyticPage.title: Analytics
analyticPage.subtitle: We provide the opportunity to work with ready-made statistics, together with the function of exporting them

card1.title: Quick start
card1.text: The interface allows you to solve tasks in a few clicks, and consultants regularly conduct training and help clients.

card2.title: A cloud of words
card2.text: AI identifies trends, automates sentiment analysis and performs other important actions.

card3.title: Problem solving
card3.text: Flexible filtering and transparent metrics help to solve various tasks — from reputation control to creating a communication strategy.

integrations.title: Connect all your tools and work efficiently
integrations.subtitle: Integrations

card1.title: Telegram integration
card1.text: Connect the telegram group and keep up to date with all the news without logging in

card2.title: All in one platform
card2.text: Create a theme and work with materials from thousands of different sources

careerPage.title: Career
careerPage.description: If you are looking for an opportunity to realize your potential, develop and make a meaningful contribution to a dynamic company, we will be glad to see you in our team.

card1.title: Employees come first
card1.text: We support creativity and innovation by giving employees the opportunity to bring bold ideas to life.

card2.title: Competitive Wages
card2.text: We offer competitive salaries, bonuses and social packages.

card3.title: Career growth
card3.text: We provide many opportunities for learning and development, helping you grow with us.

card4.title: Vacation
card4.text: Every year the company pays for holidays in any country of your choice.

card5.title: Flexible working hours
card5.text: You choose the right time of work for yourself.

card6.title: Medical insurance
card6.text: We take care of the well-being of our employees and offer medical insurance.

vacancies.title: Current open vacancies
vacancies.noVac: There are no vacancies at the moment

pricePage.title: The tariff plan
pricePage.description: Enjoy unlimited mentions, unlimited users, unlimited alerts

section.title: Simple and flexible pricing
section.subtitle: Prices
section.description: Choose a convenient package for yourself

card1.title: 1. Can I try Scano for free?
card1.text: - Of course, we offer a 7-day free trial of the system with no payment required

card2.title: 2. How is the Unlimited plan configured?
card2.text: - We coordinate with you and configure the platform according to your requirements

card3.title: 3. Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
card3.text: - After the agreement period ends, you can cancel your subscription at any time

card4.title: 4. Is the training on the functionality of the system paid?
card4.text: - No, if you have purchased a subscription from us

card5.title: 5. What payment methods do you accept?
card5.text: - We offer the following pricing options for Scano: monthly payment and annual payment

loginPage.quote: We provide assistance in improving your brand based on in-depth analytics
loginPage.author: © Shymkent 2024. "Infinity Enterprieses" LLP
loginPage.subheader: Enter your e-mail and password to log in
loginPage.description: By clicking "Login", you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
loginPage.passwordError: The password must contain at least 8 characters

mainCreateTheme.excludedUrl: Enter the URL of the source you want to exclude from monitoring

name: Topic name
archiveSMI: Annual collection is available for topics such as «Media», «Social Media and Mass Media»
reportInfo: Reports are stored for no more than 7 days
addMessageInfo1: In this section you can add a material if it was not collected automatically by the system. It will appear in the material feed in the topic and will be taken into account in all statistical sections.
addMessageInfo2: The material will be marked as “manually added” and will be available for quick search using filtering in the “Collection type” block
addMessageInfo3: You can only add materials to active topics. The required columns in the file are: date, text, link.
formatUpdateMessage: CSV format, UTF-8 encoding, no more than 50MB. You can download a zip archive.
acceptMiss: Skip unrecognized data in optional fields
searchByYearInfo: You can get quick statistics on a topic you are interested in for the last year without loading data into the system and using tariff limits
confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {item}?
linkPlaceholder: Enter the link to the material you want to add
createThemeInfo1: Not only the search scope, but also the composition of material and report metrics depends on the type.
createThemeInfo3: to creating search queries with examples
createThemeInfo4: what type or other source it is.
createThemeInfo5: A channel is a brand or company page on review sites, maps, marketplaces, social networks, app stores, etc.
detailedAboutRule: More information about the rules for connecting channels
createThemeInfo6: The tonality object is the object in relation to which the tonality is determined.
createThemeInfo: Settings that change when editing a topic do not affect already collected materials. Therefore, we recommend testing your search query at the topic creation stage. To check and optimize the settings, use the “Show results” button.
createTagInfo: Enter search words or phrases, separated by commas.
editProfileInfo1: The user's time zone affects the viewing of data in the system interface. Subscriptions and alerts are created in the Super Account Administrator time zone (UTC +6)
editProfileInfo2: The password must contain at least 8 characters, include upper and lowercase Latin letters, numbers and special characters.
createUserInfo1: The created user will be sent an email with a password. If necessary, the password can be changed in the settings.
createUserInfo2: The administrator has access to all topics with moderator mods, as well as creating new topics and adding users.
createUserInfo3: The moderator has the ability to view and edit topics for which he has moderator rights.
emailLimit: You can enter several emails separated by commas (no more than {limit})
pauseThemeDate: The actions of this topic have been suspended
noMaterial: No materials for the selected period
author: Author
